name: 100 Ways To Die: Genius Brain?
description:
“The fact that we survive at all is a miracle...
Because, every day we live...We face 100 WAYS TO DIE." :P

The GOAL of this game is simple, “KILL THE DUMB MONSTER”, even though he looks harmless and all. Sure you’ve seen many, many ways to die, now it’s time to use your imagination and see if you can help the monster make his way to a historical death and be memorable!!

You have played some escape games, puzzle solving games. In this game, turn your mind other way around. You ought to let the cute monsters’ stress out.

Features:
*Interesting gameplay, feel free to tap, swipe, tilt, blow, do anything you can think of to achieve the goal!
* HELP, we support you with various ways of help, skip the level if you are stuck, or simply see a hint to guess out the answer immediately. You can buy the helper props in the store or ask your mighty friends about it, your choice.
* FREE LEVELS, we now have 20 levels for free, and yes we aim to make it 100 soon enough. All we need is a little support from you! So if you enjoyed it, like it, hope to get more, please do support us with reviews, as well as interesting thoughts that we will consider putting in the game!!!
*See if you can figure out the ways to die faster than your friends through gamecenter.
*ALSO, A little blood does no harm!!!

If you have any interesting thoughts on the ways to die, or if you just want to make friends, feel free to contact us at :magicfantasyltd@hotmail.com

You can also like us on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MagicFantasycoop
Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/MagicFantasyltd
